on reading compounds: 跪座【キザ】kneeling with the balls of the feet on the floor and sitting on one's heels
跪拝【キハイ】kneeling and worshipping, worshipping on one's knees
拝跪【ハイキ】kneeling down (to pray), going down on one's knees
長跪【チョウキ】way of sitting by placing both knees on the ground and standing upright
